name: Get Compass Heading
description:
Get device compass heading using browser Device Orientation API. Returns heading in degrees (0-360) and cardinal direction (N, NE, E, SE, S, SW, W, NW, etc.).

Requirements:
- Browser must support DeviceOrientationEvent API
- User may need to grant permission for device sensors
- Device must have magnetometer/compass sensor
- HTTPS required (security constraint)

Returns:
- Heading in degrees (0 = North, 90 = East, 180 = South, 270 = West)
- Cardinal direction (16-point compass: N, NNE, NE, ENE, E, ESE, SE, SSE, S, SSW, SW, WSW, W, WNW, NW, NNW)
- Accuracy estimate in degrees
- Timestamp

Note: This is a client-side operation and requires browser environment. Not available in server-side execution.
